snippet: CAHILL--Catherine. It is with deep sadness that The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art has learned of the passing of Catherine Cahill. Catherine and her husband William L. Bernhard have been a treasured part of the International Council since 1982. Catherine will be missed by her many friends from around the world. Our deepest sympathies are sent to her husband William L. Bernhard, the International Council's Secretary. Agnes Gund, Chairman Sharon Percy Rockefeller, President And the Members of The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art 1/3
lead_paragraph: CAHILL--Catherine. It is with deep sadness that The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art has learned of the passing of Catherine Cahill. Catherine and her husband William L. Bernhard have been a treasured part of the International Council since 1982. Catherine will be missed by her many friends from around the world. Our deepest sympathies are sent to her husband William L. Bernhard, the International Council's Secretary. Agnes Gund, Chairman Sharon Percy Rockefeller, President And the Members of The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art 1/3
